mapper.select: SELECT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.searchKwichubCardBasic] */ HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, COMPANY_ID, SEND_DATE, SEQ_NO, CLASS, CORPNAME, CORPBIZNO, CORPNO, ESTBNO, CUSTNO, CARDBRAND, LOCALBRAND, CARDTYPE1, CARDTYPE2, CARDTYPE3, CARDTYPE4, COOPCODE, COOPNAME, CARDNO, KORNAME, ENGNAME, REGISNO, VALIDITY, POSTCODE, POSTNAME, MEMBZIPCODE, MEMBADDR1, MEMBADDR2, SETTTYPE, SETTDATE, SETTBANKCODE, SETTACCTNO, MEMBTEL, NOTICETYPE, ISSUEDATE, TMNTDATE, PAUSEDATE, BEFORECARD, ORGNNAME, ORGNCODE, ESTBNAME, USERNO, USERNAME, CARDINI, INSERT_TIME, REGR_DH FROM KWICHUB_CARD_BASIC ORDER BY HUB_IF_KEY;

SELECT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.searchKwichubCardApproval] */ HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, COMPANY_ID, SEND_DATE, SEQ_NO, CLASS, CARDNO, APPRNO, TRANSDATE, TRANSTIME, CARDTYPE1, CARDTYPE2, CURRCODE, APPRAMT, VAT, TIPS, APPRTOT, APPREXCH, USDAPPRTOT, INSTTYPE, INSTMONTH, ABROAD, SLIPNO, TERMINALNO, PURCH, ACQUISSUER, MERCHBIZNO, MERCHNO, MERCHNAME, MASTER, MERCHTEL, MERCHZIPCODE, MERCHADDR1, MERCHADDR2, MERCHSTATUS, MCCNAME, MCCCODE, PARTAPPRCANCYN, SERVTYPEYN, COLLNO, TAXTYPE, MERCHCESSDATE, ORGINTRANSDATE, ORGINAPPRNO, ORGINTRANSTIME, ORIGINMERCHNAME, ORIGINMERCHBIZNO, NTSDATE, CARDINI, INSERT_TIME, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM FROM KWICHUB_CARD_APPROVAL ORDER BY HUB_IF_KEY;

SELECT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.insertKwichubCardAcquire] */ HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, COMPANY_ID, SEND_DATE, SEQ_NO, CLASS, CARDNO, APPRNO, COLLNO, SLIPNO, APPRDATE, PURCHDATE, PURCHTIME, CURRCODE, APPRTOT, ACQUTOT, ACQUEXCH, USDACQUTOT, CONVFEE, PURCHTOT, INSTTYPE, SETTDATE, ABROAD, PURCHYN, MERCHBIZNO, MERCHNO, MERCHNAME, MASTER, MERCHTEL, MERCHZIPCODE, MERCHADDR1, MERCHADDR2, MCCNAME, MCCCODE, PARTACQUCANCYN, NONEAPPRYN, SERVTYPEYN, ORGINCOLLNO, DISCAMT, CURRACQUTOT, ACQUFEE, APPRAMT, VAT, TIPS, ORIGINMERCHNAME, ORIGINMERCHBIZNO, TAXTYPE, MERCHCESSDATE, NTSDATE, CARDINI, INSERT_TIME, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM FROM KWICHUB_CARD_ACQUIRE ORDER BY HUB_IF_KEY;

SELECT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.searchKwichubCardBill] */ HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, COMPANY_ID, SEND_DATE, SEQ_NO, CLASS, BILTYPE, CORPBIZNO, CORPNO, ESTBNO, CARDNO, APPRNO, SLIPNO, COLLNO, ORGNAPPRDATE, BILWORKDATE, BILAMT, BILFEE, MEMBSHIPFEE, ACQUEXCH, USDACQUTOT, CONVFEE, BILTOT, INSTTYPE, INSTMONTH, RESTINSTMONTH, SETTDATE, MERCHBIZNO, MERCHNAME, SERVTYPEYN, DISCAMT, ESTBNAME, USERNO, USERNAME, ORGNAPPRTOT, ORGINTRANSTIME, ORIGINMERCHNAME, ORIGINMERCHBIZNO, TAXTYPE, MERCHCESSDATE, NTSDATE, CARDINI, INSERT_TIME, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM FROM KWICHUB_CARD_BILL ORDER BY HUB_IF_KEY;

SELECT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.insertKwichubetax] */ HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, LISTGUBUN, WRITEDATE, APPNUMBER, PUBDATE, TRANSDATE, REGNUM1, REGNUM2, COMNAME, PRENAME, ADDRESS, REGNUM3, REGNUM4, COMNAME2, PRENAME2, ADDRESS2, SUM, SUPPLY, TAX, SORT, KIND, TYPE, BIGO, DIV1, EMAIL1, EMAIL2, EMAIL3, GIVEREGNUM, GIVEREGNAME, ITEMDATE, ITEMNAME, ITEMST, ITEMNUM, ITEMCOST, ITEMSUP, ITEMTAX, ITEMNOTE, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM FROM KWICHUB_ETAX ORDER BY HUB_IF_KEY;
mapper.insert:
SELECT LASTVAL(HUB_IF_SEQ);
INSERT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.KwichubServiceMapper.insertKwichubCardBasic] */ INTO KWICHUB_CARD_BASIC ( HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, COMPANY_ID, SEND_DATE, SEQ_NO, CLASS, CORPNAME, CORPBIZNO, CORPNO, ESTBNO, CUSTNO, CARDBRAND, LOCALBRAND, CARDTYPE1, CARDTYPE2, CARDTYPE3, CARDTYPE4, COOPCODE, COOPNAME, CARDNO, KORNAME, ENGNAME, REGISTNO, VALIDITY, POSTCODE, POSTNAME, MEMBZIPCODE, MEMBADDR1, MEMBADDR2, SETTTYPE, SETTDATE, SETTBANKCODE, SETTACCTNO, MEMBTEL, NOTICETYPE, ISSUEDATE, TMNTDATE, PAUSEDATE, BEFORECARD, ORGNNAME, ORGNCODE, ESTBNAME, USERNO, USERNAME, CARDINI, INSERT_TIME, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM ) VALUES ( #{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{SEQ_ROWNUM}, #{COMPANY_ID}, #{SEND_DATE}, #{SEQ_NO}, #{Class}, #{CorpName}, #{CorpBizNo}, #{CorpNo}, #{EstbNo}, #{CustNo}, #{CardBrand}, #{LocalBrand}, #{CardType1}, #{CardType2}, #{CardType3}, #{CardType4}, #{CoopCode}, #{CoopName}, #{CardNo}, #{KorName}, #{EngName}, #{RegisNo}, #{Validity}, #{PostCode}, #{PostName}, #{MembZipcode}, #{MembAddr1}, #{MembAddr2}, #{SettType}, #{SettDate}, #{SettBankCode}, #{SettAcctNo}, #{MembTel}, #{NoticeType}, #{IssueDate}, #{TmntDate}, #{PauseDate}, #{BeforeCard}, #{OrgnName}, #{OrgnCode}, #{EstbName}, #{UserNo}, #{UserName}, #{CardIni}, #{insert_time}, REGR_DH(), #{REGR_ID}, #{REGR_NM} );

SELECT LASTVAL(HUB_IF_SEQ);
INSERT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.insertKwichubCardApproval][] */ INTO KWICHUB_CARD_APPROVAL ( HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, COMPANY_ID, SEND_DATE, SEQ_NO, Class, CardNo, ApprNo, TransDate, TransTime, CardType1, CardType2, CurrCode, ApprAmt, VAT, Tips, ApprTot, ApprExch, USDApprTot, InstType, InstMonth, Abroad, SlipNo, TerminalNo, Purch, AcquIssuer, MerchBizNo, MerchNo, MerchName, Master, MerchTel, MerchZipcode, MerchAddr1, MerchAddr2, MerchStatus, MCCName, MCCCode, PartApprCancYN, ServTypeYN, CollNo, TaxType, MerchCessDate, OrginTransDate, OrginApprNo, OrginTransTime, OriginMerchName, OriginMerchBizNo, ntsdate, CardIni, insert_time, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM ) VALUES ( #{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{SEQ_ROWNUM}, #{COMPANY_ID}, #{SEND_DATE}, #{SEQ_NO}, #{Class}, #{CardNo}, #{ApprNo}, #{TransDate}, #{TransTime}, #{CardType1}, #{CardType2}, #{CurrCode}, #{ApprAmt}, #{VAT}, #{Tips}, #{ApprTot}, #{ApprExch}, #{USDApprTot}, #{InstType}, #{InstMonth}, #{Abroad}, #{SlipNo}, #{TerminalNo}, #{Purch}, #{Acqulssuer}, #{MerchBizNo}, #{MerchNo}, #{MerchName}, #{Master}, #{MerchTel}, #{MerchZipcode}, #{MerchAddr1}, #{MerchAddr2}, #{MerchStatus}, #{MCCName}, #{MCCCode}, #{PartApprCancYN}, #{ServTypeYN}, #{CollNo}, #{TaxType}, #{MerchCessDate}, #{OrginTransDate}, #{OrginApprNo}, #{OrginTransTime}, #{OrginMerchName}, #{OrginMerchBizNo}, #{ntsdate}, #{CardIni}, #{insert_time}, REGR_DH(), #{REGR_ID}, #{REGR_NM} );

SELECT LASTVAL(HUB_IF_SEQ);
INSERT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.insertKwichubCardAcquire][] */ INTO KWICHUB_CARD_ACQUIRE ( HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, COMPANY_ID, SEND_DATE, SEQ_NO, Class, CardNo, ApprNo, CollNo, SlipNo, ApprDate, PurchDate, PurchTime, CurrCode, ApprTot, AcquTot, AcquExch, USDAcquTot, ConvFee, PurchTot, InstType, SettDate, Abroad, PurchYN, MerchBizNo, MerchNo, MerchName, Master, MerchTel, MerchZipcode, MerchAddr1, MerchAddr2, MccName, MccCode, PartAcquCancYN, NoneApprYN, ServTypeYN, OrginCollNo, DiscAmt, CurrAcquTot, AcquFee, ApprAmt, VAT, Tips, OriginMerchName, OriginMerchBizNo, taxtype, MerchCessDate, ntsdate, CardIni, insert_time, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM ) VALUES ( #{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{SEQ_ROWNUM}, #{COMPANY_ID}, #{SEND_DATE}, #{SEQ_NO}, #{Class}, #{CardNo}, #{ApprNo}, #{CollNo}, #{SlipNo}, #{ApprDate}, #{PurchDate}, #{PurchTime}, #{CurrCode}, #{ApprTot}, #{AcquTot}, #{AcquExch}, #{USDAcquTot}, #{ConvFee}, #{PurchTot}, #{InstType}, #{SettDate}, #{Abroad}, #{PurchYN}, #{MerchBizNo}, #{MerchNo}, #{MerchName}, #{Master}, #{MerchTel}, #{MerchZipcode}, #{MerchAddr1}, #{MerchAddr2}, #{MccName}, #{MccCode}, #{PartAcquCancYN}, #{NoneApprYN}, #{ServTypeYN}, #{OrginCollNo}, #{DiscAmt}, #{CurrAcquTot}, #{AcquFee}, #{ApprAmt}, #{VAT}, #{Tips}, #{OriginMerchName}, #{OriginMerchBizNo}, #{taxtype}, #{MerchCessDate}, #{ntsdate}, #{CardIni}, #{insert_time}, REGR_DH(), #{REGR_ID}, #{REGR_NM} );

SELECT LASTVAL(HUB_IF_SEQ);
INSERT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.insertKwichubCardBill][] */ INTO KWICHUB_CARD_BILL ( HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, COMPANY_ID, SEND_DATE, SEQ_NO, Class, BilType, CorpBizNo, CorpNo, EstbNo, CardNo, ApprNo, SlipNo, CollNo, OrgnApprDate, BilWorkDate, BilAmt, BilFee, MembshipFee, AcquExch, USDAcquTot, ConvFee, BilTot, InstType, InstMonth, RestInstMonth, SettDate, MerchBizNo, MerchName, ServTypeYN, DiscAmt, EstbName, UserNo, UserName, OrgnApprTot, OrginTransTime, OriginMerchName, OriginMerchBizNo, taxtype, MerchCessDate, ntsdate, CardIni, insert_time, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM ) VALUES ( #{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{SEQ_ROWNUM}, #{COMPANY_ID}, #{SEND_DATE}, #{SEQ_NO}, #{Class}, #{BilType}, #{CorpBizNo}, #{CorpNo}, #{EstbNo}, #{CardNo}, #{ApprNo}, #{SlipNo}, #{CollNo}, #{OrgnApprDate}, #{BilWorkDate}, #{BilAmt}, #{BilFee}, #{MembshipFee}, #{AcquExch}, #{USDAcquTot}, #{ConvFee}, #{BilTot}, #{InstType}, #{InstMonth}, #{RestInstMonth}, #{SettDate}, #{MerchBizNo}, #{MerchName}, #{ServTypeYN}, #{DiscAmt}, #{EstbName}, #{UserNo}, #{UserName}, #{OrgnApprTot}, #{OrginTransTime}, #{OriginMerchName}, #{OriginMerchBizNo}, #{taxtype}, #{MerchCessDate}, #{ntsdate}, #{CardIni}, #{insert_time}, REGR_DH(), #{REGR_ID}, #{REGR_NM} );

SELECT LASTVAL(HUB_IF_SEQ);
INSERT /* [com.ec.eframework.mapper.ex.kwichub.kwichubServiceMapper.insertKwichubetax][] */ INTO KWICHUB_ETAX ( HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, LISTGUBUN, WRITEDATE, APPNUMBER, PUBDATE, TRANSDATE, REGNUM1, REGNUM2, COMNAME, PRENAME, ADDRESS, REGNUM3, REGNUM4, COMNAME2, PRENAME2, ADDRESS2, SUM, SUPPLY, TAX, SORT, KIND, TYPE, BIGO, DIV1, EMAIL1, EMAIL2, EMAIL3, GIVEREGNUM, GIVEREGNAME, ITEMDATE, ITEMNAME, ITEMST, ITEMNUM, ITEMCOST, ITEMSUP, ITEMTAX, ITEMNOTE, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM ) VALUES ( #{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{SEQ_ROWNUM}, #{LISTGUBUN}, #{WRITEDATE}, #{APPNUMBER}, #{PUBDATE}, #{TRANSDATE}, #{REGNUM1}, #{REGNUM2}, #{COMNAME}, #{PRENAME}, #{ADDRESS}, #{REGNUM3}, #{REGNUM4}, #{COMNAME2}, #{PRENAME2}, #{ADDRESS2}, #{SUM}, #{SUPPLY}, #{TAX}, #{SORT}, #{KIND}, #{TYPE}, #{BIGO}, #{DIV}, #{EMAIL1}, #{EMAIL2}, #{EMAIL3}, #{GIVEREGNUM}, #{GIVEREGNAME}, #{ITEMDATE}, #{ITEMNAME}, #{ITEMST}, #{ITEMNUM}, #{ITEMCOST}, #{ITEMSUP}, #{ITEMTAX}, #{ITEMNOTE}, REGR_DH(), #{REGR_ID}, #{REGR_NM} );

SELECT LASTVAL(HUB_IF_SEQ);
INSERT INTO KWICHUB_SCRAP_CARD_BASIC (HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, FCODE, LOGINID, CARDNAME, CARDNUM, CARDGUBUN, ISSUEDATE, VALIDATIONDATE, CARDISSUE, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES( #{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{SEQ_ROWNUM}, #{FCODE}, #{LOGINID}, #{CARDNAME}, #{CARDNUM}, #{CARDGUBUN}, #{ISSUEDATE}, #{VALIDATIONDATE}, #{CARDISSUE}, REGR_DH(), #{REGR_ID}, #{REGR_NM});

SELECT LASTVAL(HUB_IF_SEQ);
INSERT INTO KWICHUB_SCRAP_CARD_APPROVAL (HUB_IF_KEY, SEQ_ROWNUM, FCODE, LOGINID, USEDIS, APPNICKNAME, APPDATE, APPTIME, APPNO, APPGUBUN, APPQUOTA, APPAMT, APPFRANNAME, APPCARDDIS, APPTONGHWA, APPFRANREGNUM, APPFRANNUM, SUPPLYAMT, SURTAX, TIP, APPFRANTYPE, APPFRANTEL, APPFRANADDR, APPFRANSAJANG, APPCARDNUM, CHECKGUBUN, VRFDT, CARDISSUE, REGR_DH, REGR_ID, REGR_NM) VALUES( #{HUB_IF_KEY}, #{SEQ_ROWNUM}, #{FCODE}, #{LOGINID}, #{USEDIS}, #{APPNICKNAME}, #{APPDATE}, #{APPTIME}, #{APPNO}, #{APPGUBUN}, #{APPQUOTA}, #{APPAMT}, #{APPFRANNAME}, #{APPCARDDIS}, #{APPTONGHWA}, #{APPFRANREGNUM}, #{APPFRANNUM}, #{SUPPLYAMT}, #{SURTAX}, #{TIP}, #{APPFRANTYPE}, #{APPFRANTEL}, #{APPFRANADDR}, #{APPFRANSAJANG}, #{APPCARDNUM}, #{CHECKGUBUN}, #{VRFDT}, #{CARDISSUE}, REGR_DH(), #{REGR_ID}, #{REGR_NM});
